title: Slayer task/Trolls

properties.name: description
properties.value: Trolls can be assigned as a slayer task at level 60 combat by various slayer masters. Trolls are, for the most part, found in the Fremennik Province and north of Burthorpe.

content:
Trolls
Requirements
SkillsNone
Combat level 60
OtherNone

Vannaka60-120

Advanced data
Icon IDNo

Trolls can be assigned as a slayer task at level 60 combat by various slayer masters. Trolls are, for the most part, found in the Fremennik Province and north of Burthorpe.

Trolls fought in quests all count towards the slayer task. The bosses can be fought again in the Nightmare Zone.

Trolls tend to have alchable drops. The exception to this are the bosses and Thrower trolls found in Trollheim and Death Plateau.

Players who have completed the hard Morytania Diary might want to bring the bonecrusher to gain passive prayer experience from the big bone drops. Players with 92 Magic and the Arceuus spellbook may use the Sinister Offering spell. Arguably, it is still worth it to cast this spell upon big bones.

Ice trolls[edit | edit source]

One of the most common troll task locations is done north of Jatizso using a Dwarf multicannon. A neitiznot shield is strongly recommended because it reduces the max hit of the ice troll female Ranged attacks from 6 to 2. Bring Prayer potions to use Protect from Melee, as well as food to heal from the Ranged damage. Prayer potions may not be necessary if using the bonecrusher necklace.

Monster Variants[edit | edit source]

Monster Combat level Slayer XP Locations Notes
River troll 14-159 3-5
  • Enchanted Valley
  • River trolls spawn upon attempting to fish in the Enchanted Valley. Bring a small net.
  • The combat level of the river troll is dependent upon the player's combat level.
  • It is highly recommended to not slay Enchanted Valley river trolls, as they provide severely reduce experience for both combat and slayer experience.
Thrower Troll 67 95
  • Death Plateau (location)
Thrower troll (Trollheim) 68 95
  • Trollheim
  • These only drop bones (including long and curved bones).
Mountain troll 69, 71 90
  • Death Plateau (location)
  • Just South of Trollheim
  • South of Keldagrim
  • South of Mount Quidamortem
  • Troll Stronghold (Surface)
  • Troll Stronghold (Underground)
  • Tunnel Between Troll Arena and Trollheim
Troll spectator 71 90
  • Troll arena
Twig 71 90
  • Troll Stronghold (location) (Lower level)
Berry 71 90
  • Troll Stronghold (location) (Bottom level)
Ice troll runt 74 63
  • Fremennik Isles
  • Ice Troll Caves
  • Jatizso mine
Ice troll male 82 84
  • Fremennik Isles
  • Ice Troll Caves
  • Jatizso mine
  • Depending on the spawn location, they have different drops.
Ice troll female 82 84
  • Fremennik Isles
  • Ice Troll Caves
  • Jatizso mine
  • Depending on the spawn location, they have different drops.
Pee Hat 91 126
  • Death Plateau (location)
Kraka 91 126
  • Death Plateau (location)
Dad (Hard) 101 (201) 126 (264)
  • Troll Arena
  • Nightmare Zone
Ice troll grunt 102 84
  • Fremennik Isles
  • Ice Troll Caves
  • Yak-hide armour reduces the amount of damage taken.
Stick 104 141.5
  • Death Plateau (location)
Rock (Troll) 111 150.5
  • Death Plateau (location)
Troll general 113 150.5
  • Troll Stronghold (2nd floor[UK]3rd floor[US])
Arrg (Hard) 113 (210) 150.5 (299.6)
  • Troll Stronghold (Middle Level)
  • Nightmare Zone
Ice troll 120, 121, 123, 124 129, 97, 86, 86
  • Ice Path
  • Trollweiss Dungeon
  • Take caution, as your stats will be drained.
Ice Troll King (Hard) 122 (213) 161 (287)
  • Neitiznot Nothern part in his lair
  • Nightmare Zone
  • Uses all three attack styles.

Location Comparison[edit | edit source]

 This article is currently in the middle of an expansion or major revamping.
The information contained within it should not be considered fully accurate and/or complete. You can help by contributing to it.
Location Maplink Amount Multicombat Cannonable Safespottable Notes
Enchanted Valley 1 No No Yes
  • Summon a River troll above your combat level if you start fishing
  • fairy ring BKQ
South of Mount Quidamortem (North-east location) 7 Yes Yes Yes
  • More open than the troll location to the south-west, so luring multiple trolls is easier.
  • Rocks can be used to safespot.
  • Closer to a bank than most Mountain Trolls.
South of Mount Quidamortem (South-west location) 7 Yes Yes Yes
  • High number of obstacles makes safespotting easier.
Death Plateau 15 No Yes Yes
  • Protect from Missiles is highly recommended while running through the canyon leading up to the plateau
  • One of the faster places to get to by teleporting to burthope (Games Necklace or Combat Bracelet)
  • Shooting through the troll buildings consisting of rocks is possible making safespotting easier.

Trolls can be assigned as a slayer task at level 60 [[combat]] by various [[Slayer master|slayer masters]]. Trolls are, for the most part, found in the [[Fremennik Province]] and north of [[Burthorpe]].

Trolls fought in [[quests]] all count towards the slayer task. The [[Boss|bosses]] can be fought again in the [[Nightmare Zone]].

Trolls tend to have [[High Level Alchemy|alchable]] drops. The exception to this are the bosses and Thrower trolls found in [[Trollheim]] and [[Death Plateau (location)|Death Plateau]].

Players who have completed the [[Morytania Diary#Hard|hard]] [[Morytania Diary]] might want to bring the [[bonecrusher]] to gain passive prayer experience from the [[Big bones|big bone]] drops. Players with 92 Magic and the Arceuus spellbook may use the Sinister Offering spell. Arguably, it is still worth it to cast this spell upon big bones.

===Ice trolls===
One of the most common troll task locations is done north of [[Jatizso]] using a [[Dwarf multicannon]]. A [[neitiznot shield]] is '''strongly''' recommended because it reduces the max hit of the [[ice troll female]] Ranged attacks from 6 to 2. Bring Prayer potions to use [[Protect from Melee]], as well as [[food]] to heal from the Ranged damage. Prayer potions may not be necessary if using the [[bonecrusher necklace]].
[[File:Jatizso cannon spot.png|left|400px]]
